pkgmetadata.longdescription: ![Unit Tests](https://github.com/hile/pathlib-tree/actions/workflows/unittest.yml/badge.svg)![Style Checks](https://github.com/hile/pathlib-tree/actions/workflows/lint.yml/badge.svg)# Tree extension for pathlib.PathThis module implements an extensible tree-like object `pathlib_tree.Tree` that can be iteratedand subclassed to use for various filesystem tree processing tasks.
